properties.name: Munson Field, Wantagh
properties.description: Posted by CoachleebaseballRed Maple Drive South and Return Lane, Wantagh, NYThis is MUNSON FIELD, WANTAGH NY (just passed Whalen Fld Wantagh) DIRECTIONS: GO TO WHELAN FIELD, WANTAGH (across from MacArthur High School) THEN PROCEED FROM WHALEN TO MUNSON FIELD. Take Southern State to exite 28 North. Make right on to Wantagh Ave and go approx. 1 mile. Whalen Field is on Right Hand side adjacent to Wantagh Ave. Make Right on to Red Maple Drive South along the outfield fence of Whalen Field, follow East a few blocks to RETURN LANE, MUNSON Field is on LEFT off REd Maple, East of RETURN LANE.

properties.name: Randall Park Ball Field, Freeport NY
properties.description: Posted by Coachleebaseball Where we played two of the toughest rookie travel games in 2006, and hung tough on a near come back against league champs Freeport. Eric Bogs had a spectacular 10 pitch at bat during 6th ininng rally!
